head.title: Use Prose to manage your content of a Phenomic project hosted on GitHub
head.description: Prose provides a beautifully simple content authoring environment for CMS-free websites. It's a web-based interface for managing content onâ€¦

body:
Prose provides a beautifully simple content authoring environment for CMS-free websites. It's a web-based interface for managing content on GitHub. Use it to create, edit, and delete files, and save your changes directly to GitHub.

  1. Go to http://prose.io/#YourGitHubUsername/your-phenomic-project-repository
  2. Click Authorize on GitHub and sign in to continue
  3. Create, edit, and delete files online in the Prose.io web-based editor, saving your changes directly to GitHub
